item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello World

This is my first post on my newly created blog. How exciting!

I’m a Software Engineer who moved across Europe. Here I share my ideas, projects, and interests. To celebrate, I leave my favorite game of all time as an Easter egg below.

Thanks,
